advitam:materialize: Press %s while encased in blocks to reanimate.
advitam:spawn_changed: Your Anchor is at %s in the %s.
requiem:remnant_type.advitam.wraith.name: Wraith
advitam:advancements.advitam.reanimation: Procure a vessel out of thin air
advitam:advancements.advitam.anchor_attu: Become a Wraith by attempting to use the Vanilla spawn mechanic as a Demon
advitam:advancements.advitam.host_rebell: Have a Host kick you out
gamerule.advitam:reanimationCap.descript: Reanimation is disabled at or above this Attrition level (0 to fully disable, -1 to always allow)
gamerule.advitam:reanimationCost.descrip: Attrition inflicted upon reanimation (0 to disable)
A Host revitalizes and escapes its possessor instead of dying when at or above this Attrition level (-1 to disable)
gamerule.advitam:mementoDuration.descrip: Base duration of the Memento status effect (0 disables the Memento effect)
gamerule.advitam:mementoConversion.descr: The percentage of Attrition stacks that convert into Memento stacks (0 disables the Memento effect)
gamerule.advitam:mementoScales.descripti: Duration of the Memento status effect scales linearly based on its amplifier
gamerule.advitam:secondWindDuration.desc: Base duration of the Second Wind status effect (0 to disable)
gamerule.advitam:passiveDetectionMaxRang: Maximum range in which a Host can passively aggro a Hostile
gamerule.advitam:passiveDetectionSafetyM: Passive Detection will not activate if there is an aggro'd Mob within a range of Max Range * Safety Multiplier
gamerule.advitam:attritionSoftlock.descr: Remnants will not be able to possess a Mob at or above this Attrition Level (-1 to disable)
